trans-unit.source: When using mod_auth_basic, this module is invoked via the AuthBasicProvider directive with the anon value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 mod_auth_basic 时，可通过 AuthBasicProvider 指令以 anon 值调用此模块。

trans-unit.source: When using mod_auth_basic, this module is invoked via the AuthBasicProvider directive with the ldap value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 mod_auth_basic 时，将通过 AuthBasicProvider 指令使用 ldap 值调用此模块。

trans-unit.source: When using AuthDigestProvider and Digest Authentication, providers perform a similar check to find a matching username in their data stores. However, unlike in the Basic Authentication case, the value associated with each stored username must be an encrypted string composed from the username, realm name, and password. (See RFC 2617, Section 3.2.2.2 for more details on the format used for this encrypted string.)
trans-unit.target: 当使用 AuthDigestProvider 和Digest Authentication时，提供程序执行类似的检查以在其数据存储中找到匹配的用户名。但是，与“基本身份验证”情况不同，与每个存储的用户名关联的值必须是由用户名，领域名称和密码组成的加密字符串。 （有关此加密字符串使用的格式的更多详细信息，请参阅RFC 2617，第3.2.2.2节。）

trans-unit.source: When using AuthDigestProvider and Digest Authentication, providers perform a similar check to find a matching username in their data stores. However, unlike in the Basic Authentication case, the value associated with each stored username must be an encrypted string composed from the username, realm name, and password. (See RFC 2617, Section 3.2.2.2 for more details on the format used for this encrypted string.)

When using strftime(3) filename formatting, be sure the log file format has enough granularity to produce a different file name each time the logs are rotated. Otherwise rotation will overwrite the same file instead of starting a new one. For example, if logfile was /var/log/errorlog.%Y-%m-%d with log rotation at 5 megabytes, but 5 megabytes was reached twice in the same day, the same log file name would be produced and log rotation would keep writing to the same file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 strftime(3) 文件名格式时，请确保日志文件格式具有足够的粒度，以便每次旋转日志时都产生不同的文件名。否则，轮换将覆盖同一文件，而不是启动一个新文件。例如，如果 logfile 为 /var/log/errorlog.%Y-%m-%d ，日志轮换为5 MB，但是同一天两次达到5 MB，则将产生相同的日志文件名并轮换日志将继续写入同一文件。

trans-unit.source: When using [F], an [L] is implied - that is, the response is returned immediately, and no further rules are evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 当使用[F]时,意味着[L]--也就是说,响应会立即返回,而且不会再评估其他规则。

trans-unit.source: When using [G], an [L] is implied - that is, the response is returned immediately, and no further rules are evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 当使用[G]时,意味着[L]--也就是说,响应会立即返回,而且不会再评估其他规则。

trans-unit.target: 当使用大量的虚拟主机时,Apache可能会用完可用的文件描述符(有时称为

trans-unit.source: When using a multi-threaded MPM under unix, the module mod_cgid should be used in place of this module. At the user level, the two modules are essentially identical.
trans-unit.target: 在unix下使用多线程MPM时，应使用模块 mod_cgid 代替该模块。在用户级别，这两个模块基本相同。

trans-unit.source: When using cookie based stickyness, you need to configure the name of the cookie that contains the information about which back-end to use. This is done via the stickysession attribute added to either ProxyPass or ProxySet. The name of the cookie is case-sensitive. The balancer extracts the value of the cookie and looks for a member worker with route equal to that value. The route must also be set in either ProxyPass or ProxySet. The cookie can either be set by the back-end, or as shown in the above example by the Apache web server itself.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于cookie的粘性时，您需要配置cookie的名称，该cookie包含有关使用哪个后端的信息。这可以通过添加到 ProxyPass 或 ProxySet 的 stickysession 属性来完成。 Cookie的名称区分大小写。平衡器提取cookie的值，并查找 route 等于该值的成员worker 。该 route 也必须在任一设定 ProxyPass 或 ProxySet 。 Cookie可以由后端设置，也可以如上例中所示由Apache Web服务器本身设置。

trans-unit.source: When using multiple certificates to support different authentication algorithms (like RSA, DSA, but mainly ECC) and OpenSSL prior to 1.0.2, it is recommended to either use custom DH parameters (preferably) by adding them to the first certificate file (as described above), or to order the SSLCertificateFile directives such that RSA/DSA certificates are placed after the ECC one.
trans-unit.target: 当使用多个证书来支持不同的身份验证算法（例如RSA，DSA，但主要是ECC）和1.0.2之前的OpenSSL时，建议使用自定义DH参数（最好），方法是将其添加到第一个证书文件中（如所述）以上），或订购 SSLCertificateFile 指令，以便将RSA / DSA证书放在ECC 证书之后。

trans-unit.source: When using prepared statements with a MySQL database, it is preferred to set reconnect to 0 in the connection string as to avoid errors that arise from the MySQL client reconnecting without properly resetting the prepared statements. If set to 1, any broken connections will be attempted fixed, but as mod_dbd is not informed, the prepared statements will be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 将预备语句与MySQL数据库一起使用时，最好在连接字符串中将 reconnect 设置为0，以避免在未正确重置预备语句的情况下因MySQL客户端重新连接而引起的错误。如果设置为1，将尝试修复任何断开的连接，但是由于未通知mod_dbd，因此准备好的语句将无效。

trans-unit.source: When using the crypt() algorithm, note that only the first 8 characters of the password are used to form the password. If the supplied password is longer, the extra characters will be silently discarded.
trans-unit.target: 使用 crypt() 算法时，请注意，仅使用密码的前8个字符来构成密码。如果提供的密码更长，多余的字符将被静默丢弃。

trans-unit.source: When using the NOT character to negate a pattern, you cannot include grouped wildcard parts in that pattern. This is because, when the pattern does NOT match (ie, the negation matches), there are no contents for the groups. Thus, if negated patterns are used, you cannot use $N in the substitution string!
trans-unit.target: 当使用NOT字符取反一个模式时，您不能在该模式中包括分组的通配符部分。这是因为，如果模式不匹配（即，否定匹配），则组中没有内容。因此，如果使用取反的模式，则不能在替换字符串中使用 $N ！

trans-unit.target: 什么时候模块会取消引用别名?

trans-unit.source: When working with Apache it is important to know how it will find the configuration file. You can specify a configuration file on the command line in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 在使用Apache时,知道它如何找到配置文件是很重要的。你可以通过两种方式在命令行中指定配置文件。

trans-unit.source: When working with Apache it is important to know how it will find the configuration files. You can specify a configuration file on the command line in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 在使用Apache时,知道它如何找到配置文件是很重要的。你可以通过两种方式在命令行中指定配置文件。

trans-unit.source: When writing data to the client, the length of time to wait for an acknowledgement of a packet if the send buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 向客户端写入数据时,如果发送缓冲区已满,等待数据包确认的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: When you ./configure you Apache httpd source tree, you need to give it '--enable-http2' as additional argument to trigger the build of the module. Should your libnghttp2 reside in an unusual place (whatever that is on your operating system), you may announce its location with '--with-nghttp2=<path>' to configure.
trans-unit.target: 当 ./configure Apache httpd源代码树时，需要给它' --enable-http2 '作为附加参数来触发模块的构建。如果您的 libnghttp2 驻留在不寻常的地方（无论操作系统上是什么），您都可以使用“ --with-nghttp2=<path> ”来声明其位置以进行 configure 。

trans-unit.source: When you POST a web form to a CGI program, the data in that form is bundled up into a special format and gets delivered to your CGI program over STDIN. The program then can process that data as though it was coming in from the keyboard, or from a file
trans-unit.target: 当你 POST 网页表单的CGI程序，在表单中的数据被捆绑成一个特殊格式并获取传递到在你的CGI程序 STDIN 。然后，程序可以像处理来自键盘或文件中的数据一样处理该数据。

trans-unit.source: When you add a name-based virtual host to an existing server, and the virtual host arguments match preexisting IP and port combinations, requests will now be handled by an explicit virtual host. In this case, it's usually wise to create a default virtual host with a ServerName matching that of the base server. New domains on the same interface and port, but requiring separate configurations, can then be added as subsequent (non-default) virtual hosts.
trans-unit.target: 当您将基于名称的虚拟主机添加到现有服务器时，并且虚拟主机参数与预先存在的IP和端口组合匹配时，请求现在将由显式虚拟主机处理。在这种情况下，通常明智的做法是使用 ServerName 与基础服务器匹配的默认虚拟主机。然后可以将位于同一接口和端口上但需要单独配置的新域添加为后续（非默认）虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: When you have a httpd built with mod_http2 you need some basic configuration for it becoming active. The first thing, as with every Apache module, is that you need to load it:
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 mod_http2 构建了一个 httpd 时，您需要一些基本配置使其生效。与每个Apache模块一样，第一件事是您需要加载它：

trans-unit.source: When you issue a restart, a syntax check is first run, to ensure that there are no errors in the configuration files. If your configuration file has errors in it, you will get an error message about that syntax error, and the server will refuse to restart. This avoids the situation where the server halts and then cannot restart, leaving you with a non-functioning server.
trans-unit.target: 当你发出重启时,首先会运行语法检查,以确保配置文件中没有错误。如果你的配置文件中存在错误,你会得到一个关于语法错误的错误信息,并且服务器将拒绝重启。这就避免了服务器停止后无法重启,使你的服务器无法运行的情况。

trans-unit.source: When you know all of your users (eg, as is often the case on a corporate Intranet), you can require plain certificate authentication. All you need to do is to create client certificates signed by your own CA certificate (ca.crt) and then verify the clients against this certificate.
trans-unit.target: 当您知道所有用户时（例如，在公司Intranet上通常如此），则可以要求普通证书身份验证。您需要做的就是创建由您自己的CA证书（ ca.crt ）签名的客户端证书，然后根据此证书验证客户端。

trans-unit.source: When you miss HTTP headers from the environment, make sure they are formatted according to RFC 2616, section 4.2: Header names must start with a letter, followed only by letters, numbers or hyphen. Any header violating this rule will be dropped silently.
trans-unit.target: 当您错过环境中的HTTP标头时，请确保它们按照RFC 2616第4.2节的格式设置：标头名称必须以字母开头，之后只能是字母，数字或连字符。任何违反此规则的标头都将被静默删除。

trans-unit.source: When you miss HTTP headers from the environment, make sure they are formatted according to RFC 2616, section 4.2: Header names must start with a letter, followed only by letters, numbers or hyphen. Any header violating this rule will be dropped silently.

When you post a question about a CGI problem that you're having, whether to a mailing list, or to a newsgroup, make sure you provide enough information about what happened, what you expected to happen, and how what actually happened was different, what server you're running, what language your CGI program was in, and, if possible, the offending code. This will make finding your problem much simpler.
trans-unit.target: 当你发布一个关于你所遇到的CGI问题的问题时,不管是在邮件列表中,还是在新闻组中,都要确保你提供足够的信息,包括发生了什么事,你期望发生什么事,以及实际发生的事有什么不同,你正在运行的服务器是什么,你的CGI程序是用什么语言编写的,如果可能的话,还要提供违规的代码。这将使找到你的问题变得更加简单。

trans-unit.source: When you put configuration directives in a .htaccess file, and you don't get the desired effect, there are a number of things that may be going wrong.
trans-unit.target: 当您将配置指令放入 .htaccess 文件中时，您没有得到预期的效果，可能有很多事情出错了。

trans-unit.source: When you run a program from your command line, you have certain information that is passed to the shell without you thinking about it. For example, you have a PATH, which tells the shell where it can look for files that you reference.
trans-unit.target: 当您从命令行运行程序时，无需考虑就可以将某些信息传递给外壳。例如，您有一个 PATH ，它告诉Shell在哪里可以找到您引用的文件。

trans-unit.source: When you use mod_md to obtain a certificate, you become a customer of the CA (e.g. Let's Encrypt). That means you need to read and agree to their Terms of Service, so that you understand what they offer and what they might exclude or require from you. mod_md cannot, by itself, agree to such a thing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 mod_md 获得证书时，您将成为CA的客户（例如，让我们加密）。这意味着您需要阅读并同意他们的服务条款，以便您了解他们提供的服务以及他们可能对您排除或要求的内容。 mod_md 本身不能同意这样的事情。

trans-unit.source: When you wish to split your log file into its component parts (one file per virtual host) you can use the program split-logfile to accomplish this. You'll find this program in the support directory of the Apache distribution.
trans-unit.target: 当您希望将日志文件拆分为各个组成部分（每个虚拟主机一个文件）时，可以使用 split-logfile 程序来完成此操作。您可以在Apache发行版的 support 目录中找到该程序。

trans-unit.source: When you write CGI programs, you should consider using a code library, or module, to do most of the grunt work for you. This leads to fewer errors, and faster development.
trans-unit.target: 当你编写CGI程序时,你应该考虑使用一个代码库,或模块,为你完成大部分的繁重工作。这样可以减少错误,加快开发速度。

trans-unit.source: Where SELECTIVE mode is selected for a virtual host, the activation of privileges must be deferred until after the mapping phase of request processing has determined what <Directory> context applies to the request. This might give an attacker opportunities to introduce code through a RewriteMap running at top-level or <VirtualHost> context before privileges have been dropped and userid/gid set.
trans-unit.target: 其中被选择用于虚拟主机SELECTIVE模式，权限的激活必须推迟到以后请求处理的映射阶段已经确定什么 <Directory> 上下文适用于该请求。这可能使攻击者有机会通过在特权或用户ID / gid设置之前在顶级或 <VirtualHost> 上下文中运行的 RewriteMap 引入代码。

trans-unit.source: Where a key is set to the empty string, that key will be removed from the session.
trans-unit.target: 当一个键被设置为空字符串时,该键将从会话中删除。

Whether or not you have preloaded an ISAPI extension, all ISAPI extensions are governed by the same permissions and restrictions as CGI scripts. That is, OptionsExecCGI must be set for the directory that contains the ISAPI .dll file.

SubstituteInheritBefore is itself inherited, hence contexts that inherit it (those that don't specify their own SubstituteInheritBefore value) will apply the closest defined merge order.

trans-unit.target: 当发送至FTP服务器时,是否对请求的文件名中的通配符进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Whether wildcards in requested filenames trigger a file listing
trans-unit.target: 要求的文件名中的通配符是否会触发文件列表。

trans-unit.source: While mod_mime associates metadata with filename extensions, the core server provides directives that are used to associate all the files in a given container (e.g., <Location>, <Directory>, or <Files>) with particular metadata. These directives include ForceType, SetHandler, SetInputFilter, and SetOutputFilter. The core directives override any filename extension mappings defined in mod_mime.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 mod_mime 与文件扩展名相关联的元数据，该 core 服务器提供了用于所有文件在给定容器（关联指令例如， <Location> ， <Directory> 或 <Files> ）与特定的元数据。这些指令包括 ForceType ， SetHandler ， SetInputFilter 和 SetOutputFilter 。核心指令会覆盖 mod_mime 中定义的任何文件名扩展名映射。

trans-unit.source: While mod_so still loads modules with ApacheModuleFoo.dll names, the new naming convention is preferred; if you are converting your loadable module for 2.0, please fix the name to this 2.0 convention.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 mod_so 与仍然加载模块 ApacheModuleFoo.dll 名称，新的命名规则优先;如果您要将可加载模块转换为2.0，请将该名称更正为该2.0约定。

trans-unit.source: While TCP adjust its flow-control and window sizes, longer TLS records can get stuck in queues or get lost and need retransmission. This is of course true for all packets. TLS however needs the whole record in order to decrypt it. Any missing bytes at the end will stall usage of the received ones.
trans-unit.target: 当TCP调整其流控和窗口大小时,较长的TLS记录可能会卡在队列中或丢失,需要重传。当然,这对所有的数据包都是如此。然而TLS需要整个记录才能解密。任何在最后缺少的字节都会使收到的记录停止使用。

trans-unit.source: While filenames are generally case-insensitive on Windows, URLs are still treated internally as case-sensitive before they are mapped to the filesystem. For example, the <Location>, Alias, and ProxyPass directives all use case-sensitive arguments. For this reason, it is particularly important to use the <Directory> directive when attempting to limit access to content in the filesystem, since this directive applies to any content in a directory, regardless of how it is accessed. If you wish to assure that only lowercase is used in URLs, you can use something like:
trans-unit.target: 尽管在Windows上文件名通常不区分大小写，但在将URL映射到文件系统之前，仍在内部将它们视为区分大小写。例如， <Location> ， Alias 和 ProxyPass 指令均使用区分大小写的参数。因此，在尝试限制对文件系统中内容的访问时，使用 <Directory> 指令尤为重要，因为此指令适用于目录中的任何内容，无论如何访问。如果您希望确保URL中仅使用小写字母，则可以使用以下方法：

trans-unit.source: While many distributions make Apache httpd available as operating system supported packages, it can sometimes be desirable to install and use the canonical version of Apache httpd on these systems, replacing the natively provided versions of the packages.
trans-unit.target: 虽然许多发行版都将Apache httpd作为操作系统支持的软件包提供,但有时在这些系统上安装并使用Apache httpd的标准版本,以取代本地提供的软件包版本,也是可取的。

trans-unit.source: While processing a request, the server looks for the first existing configuration file from this list of names in every directory of the path to the document, if distributed configuration files are enabled for that directory. For example:

trans-unit.source: While sending the response to the client, it might happen that the TCP write buffer fills up because the connection is too slow. Usually in this case a write() to the socket returns EWOULDBLOCK or EAGAIN, to become writable again after an idle time. The worker holding the socket might be able to offload the waiting task to the listener thread, that in turn will re-assign it to the first idle worker thread available once an event will be raised for the socket (for example, "the socket is now writable"). Please check the Limitations section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在将响应发送到客户端时，由于连接速度太慢，TCP写缓冲区可能已满。通常，在这种情况下，对套接字的 write() 返回 EWOULDBLOCK 或 EAGAIN ，以在空闲时间之后再次变为可写状态。持有套接字的工作程序可能能够将等待的任务卸载到侦听器线程，从而一旦套接字发生事件（例如，“套接字已现在可写”）。请检查“限制”部分以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: While set to on, asynchronous support for ISAPI callbacks is simulated.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为on时,将模拟对ISAPI回调的异步支持。

trans-unit.source: While that should do the trick for most, they are people who might prefer a statically linked nghttp2 in this module. For those, the option --enable-nghttp2-staticlib-deps exists. It works quite similar to how one statically links openssl to mod_ssl.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这对于大多数人来说应该可以解决问题，但有些人可能更喜欢此模块中的静态链接 nghttp2 。对于这些选项，存在 --enable-nghttp2-staticlib-deps 选项。它的工作原理与将 mod_ssl 静态链接到mod_ssl的方式非常相似。

trans-unit.source: While the Apache httpd project does not currently create binary RPMs for the various distributions out there, it is easy to build your own binary RPMs from the canonical Apache httpd tarball.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Apache httpd项目目前并没有为不同的发行版创建二进制RPM,但从标准的Apache httpd tar包中创建自己的二进制RPM还是很容易的。

trans-unit.source: While the parent process is usually started as root under Unix in order to bind to port 80, the child processes and threads are launched by the server as a less-privileged user. The User and Group directives are used to set the privileges of the Apache HTTP Server child processes. The child processes must be able to read all the content that will be served, but should have as few privileges beyond that as possible. In addition, unless suexec is used, these directives also set the privileges which will be inherited by CGI scripts.
trans-unit.target: 为了绑定到端口80，父进程通常在Unix下以 root 身份启动，而子进程和线程则由服务器以特权较低的用户身份启动。在 User 和 Group 指令用于设置Apache HTTP服务器的子进程的权限。子进程必须能够读取将要提供的所有内容，但应具有尽可能少的特权。另外，除非使用 suexec ，否则这些指令还将设置CGI脚本将继承的特权。

trans-unit.source: While the parent process is usually started as root under Unix in order to bind to port 80, the child processes are launched by Apache httpd as a less-privileged user. The User and Group directives are used to set the privileges of the Apache httpd child processes. The child processes must be able to read all the content that will be served, but should have as few privileges beyond that as possible.
trans-unit.target: 虽然父进程通常是在Unix下以 root 身份启动，以便绑定到端口80，但是子进程由Apache httpd作为特权较低的用户启动。在 User 和 Group 指令用于设置Apache的httpd的子进程的权限。子进程必须能够读取将要提供的所有内容，但应具有尽可能少的特权。

trans-unit.source: While this directive is supported in virtual host context, the changes it makes are visible to any later configuration directives, beyond any enclosing virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 虽然该指令在虚拟主机上下文中得到支持,但它所做的更改对任何后来的配置指令都是可见的,超越了任何包围的虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: While this directive may be specified in any virtual host, it is important to understand that because the PROXY protocol is connection based and protocol agnostic, the enabling and disabling is actually based on IP address and port. This means that if you have multiple name-based virtual hosts for the same host and port, and you enable it for any one of them, then it is enabled for all of them (with that host and port). It also means that if you attempt to enable the PROXY protocol in one and disable in the other, that won't work; in such a case, the last one wins and a notice will be logged indicating which setting was being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个指令可以在任何虚拟主机中指定,但要明白的是,由于PROXY协议是基于连接的,协议不可知,所以启用和禁用实际上是基于IP地址和端口的。这意味着,如果你有多个基于名称的虚拟主机,对于同一个主机和端口,你为其中任何一个虚拟主机启用,那么它就会为所有的虚拟主机(与该主机和端口)启用。这也意味着,如果你试图在一个主机中启用PROXY协议,而在另一个主机中禁用PROXY协议,那将无法工作;在这种情况下,最后一个主机获胜,并将记录一个通知,说明哪个设置被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: While this is great for performance, it comes at a price: such vhosts need more care in their configuration. The problem is that you will have multiple requests for multiple hosts on the same TLS connection. And that makes renegotiation impossible, in face the HTTP/2 standard forbids it.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这对性能来说很好,但它也是有代价的:这样的vhosts需要在配置上更加小心。问题是,你会在同一个TLS连接上有多个主机的多个请求。而这使得重新协商成为不可能,面对HTTP/2标准是禁止的。

trans-unit.source: While this mode offers the best performance, the administrator may find that under certain circumstances they may want to perform further processing on the request after the request is cached, such as to inject personalisation into the cached page, or to apply authorisation restrictions to the content. Under these circumstances, an administrator is often forced to place independent reverse proxy servers either behind or in front of the caching server to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这种模式提供了最好的性能,但管理员可能会发现,在某些情况下,他们可能希望在请求被缓存后对请求进行进一步的处理,例如在缓存页面中注入个性化,或对内容施加授权限制。在这种情况下,管理员往往不得不在缓存服务器的后面或前面放置独立的反向代理服务器来实现这一目的。

trans-unit.source: While with the following configuration you specify a preference for specific speed-optimized ciphers (which will be selected by mod_ssl, provided that they are supported by the client):
trans-unit.target: 而在下面的配置中,您可以指定特定的速度优化的密码(只要客户端支持,mod_ssl就会选择这些密码)。

trans-unit.source: While you cannot declare a map in per-directory context (.htaccess files or <Directory> blocks) it is possible to use this map in per-directory context.
trans-unit.target: 虽然无法在每个目录的上下文（ .htaccess 文件或 <Directory> 块）中声明映射，但是可以在每个目录的上下文中使用此映射。

trans-unit.source: Why are the SSL_XXX variables not available to my CGI & SSI scripts?
trans-unit.target: 为什么 SSL_XXX 变量对我的CGI和SSI脚本不可用？

trans-unit.target: 为什么我不能对基于名称/非IP的虚拟主机使用SSL?

trans-unit.target: 为什么到我的服务器的HTTPS连接有时需要30秒才能建立连接?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get ``Connection Refused'' messages, when trying to access my newly installed Apache+mod_ssl server via HTTPS?
trans-unit.target: 当我试图通过HTTPS访问我新安装的Apache+mod_ssl服务器时,为什么会收到 "连接拒绝 "消息?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get ``no shared cipher'' errors, when trying to use Anonymous Diffie-Hellman (ADH) ciphers?
trans-unit.target: 当我试图使用匿名Diffie-Hellman (ADH)密码时,为什么会出现 "无共享密码 "错误?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get a 'no shared ciphers' error when connecting to my newly installed server?
trans-unit.target: 为什么当我连接到新安装的服务器时,会出现 "没有共享密码 "的错误?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get a file listing when I expected a file to be downloaded?
trans-unit.target: 为什么我期望下载的文件,却得到一个文件列表?

trans-unit.target: 为什么当我使用超过1024位的证书时,基于Java的客户端会出现握手失败?

trans-unit.source: Why do I get lots of random SSL protocol errors under heavy server load?
trans-unit.target: 为什么在服务器重载的情况下会出现很多随机的SSL协议错误?

trans-unit.target: 当我启动Apache时,为什么会出现与SSLMutex相关的权限错误?

trans-unit.target: 为什么浏览器抱怨无法验证我的服务器证书?

trans-unit.target: 为什么当我启动Apache时,mod_ssl会以 "Failed to generate temporary 512 bit RSA private key "的错误停止?

trans-unit.target: 为什么我的Web服务器的负载较高,现在它服务于SSL加密的流量?

trans-unit.target: 为什么当我连接到我的SSL感知的Apache服务器时,连接挂起?

trans-unit.target: 为什么文件类型 <var>xxx</var> 不能通过FTP下载？

trans-unit.source: Wildcard matching is supported for specific cases: an subjectAltName entry of type dNSName, or CN attributes starting with *. will match with any host name of the same number of name elements and the same suffix. E.g. *.example.org will match foo.example.org, but will not match foo.bar.example.org, because the number of elements in the respective host names differs.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下支持通配符匹配：dNSName类型的subjectAltName条目，或以 *. 开头的CN属性。将与具有相同数量的名称元素和相同后缀的任何主机名匹配。例如 *.example.org 将匹配 foo.example.org ，但是将不匹配 foo.bar.example.org ，因为各个主机名中的元素数量不同。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards may be included in the directory or file portion of the path. This example will fail if there is no subdirectory in conf/vhosts that contains at least one *.conf file:
trans-unit.target: 通配符可以包含在路径的目录或文件部分。如果conf/vhosts中没有包含至少一个*.conf文件的子目录,这个例子将失败。

trans-unit.source: Will behave as documented, although the fKeepConn flag is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 尽管会忽略 fKeepConn 标志，但其行为将与文档中所述相同。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the scheme of the request (usually "http" or "https"). This value can be influenced with ServerName.
trans-unit.target: 将包含请求的方案（通常为“ http”或“ https”）。可以使用 ServerName 来影响此值。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the text "on" if the connection is using SSL/TLS, or "off" otherwise. (This variable can be safely used regardless of whether or not mod_ssl is loaded).
trans-unit.target: 如果连接使用的是SSL / TLS，则将包含文本“ on”，否则将包含“ off”。（无论是否加载了 mod_ssl ，都可以安全地使用此变量）。

trans-unit.source: Will contain the text "true" if the request currently being processed is a sub-request, "false" otherwise. Sub-requests may be generated by modules that need to resolve additional files or URIs in order to complete their tasks.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在处理的请求是一个子请求,将包含文本 "true",否则为 "false"。子请求可能由需要解析额外文件或URI的模块生成,以完成其任务。

trans-unit.source: Will dump the full data passing through to a tempfile before the provider. For single-user debug only; this will not support concurrent hits.
trans-unit.target: 将转储提供者之前传递到临时文件的完整数据。仅用于单用户调试；这将不支持并发命中。

trans-unit.source: Will report false if the request has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求被取消,将报假。

trans-unit.source: Will return the negotiated Keep-Alive status.

Window's mpm_winnt interprets the AcceptFilter to toggle the AcceptEx() API, and does not support http protocol buffering. connect will use the AcceptEx() API, also retrieve the network endpoint addresses, but like none the connect option does not wait for the initial data transmission.
trans-unit.target: Window的mpm_winnt解释AcceptFilter以切换AcceptEx（）API，并且不支持http协议缓冲。 connect 将使用AcceptEx（）API，还检索网络端点地址，但是像 none connect 一样，connect选项不会等待初始数据传输。

trans-unit.source: With event, increase this directive if the process number defined by your MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild settings, plus the number of gracefully shutting down processes, is more than 16 server processes (default).
trans-unit.target: 使用 event ，如果由 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 设置定义的进程号加上正常关闭的进程数大于16个服务器进程（默认值），请增加此指令。

trans-unit.source: With worker, use this directive only if your MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild settings require more than 16 server processes (default). Do not set the value of this directive any higher than the number of server processes required by what you may want for MaxRequestWorkers and ThreadsPerChild.
trans-unit.target: 使用 worker 时，仅当您的 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 设置需要超过16个服务器进程（默认）时，才使用此伪指令。请勿将此指令的值设置为高于您可能对 MaxRequestWorkers 和 ThreadsPerChild 所需的服务器进程数。

trans-unit.source: With MDPortMap you can tell it which 'Internet port' corresponds to which local port.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MDPortMap ,您可以告诉它哪个“ Internet端口”对应于哪个本地端口。

trans-unit.source: With ProtocolsHonorOrder set to on (default), the client ordering does not matter and only the ordering in the server settings influences the outcome of the protocol negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 在 ProtocolsHonorOrder 设置为 on （默认）的情况下，客户端顺序无关紧要，只有服务器设置中的顺序会影响协议协商的结果。

trans-unit.source: With UseCanonicalName Off Apache httpd will form self-referential URLs using the hostname and port supplied by the client if any are supplied (otherwise it will use the canonical name, as defined above). These values are the same that are used to implement name-based virtual hosts and are available with the same clients. The CGI variables SERVER_NAME and SERVER_PORT will be constructed from the client supplied values as well.
trans-unit.target: 与 UseCanonicalName Off 的Apache的httpd将形成使用由如果使用了任何客户端提供的主机名和端口自引用的URL（否则它将使用的规范名称，如上面所定义）。这些值与用于实现基于名称的虚拟主机的值相同，并且可用于相同的客户端。CGI变量 SERVER_NAME 和 SERVER_PORT 也将由客户端提供的值构造。

trans-unit.source: With UseCanonicalPhysicalPort Off, the physical ports are removed from the ordering.
trans-unit.target: 随着 UseCanonicalPhysicalPort Off ，物理端口从排序中删除。

trans-unit.source: With Apache's ability to set environment variables with the SetEnvIf directives, and other related directives, this functionality can let you do a wide variety of dynamic content on the server side without resorting a full web application.
trans-unit.target: Apache具有通过 SetEnvIf 指令和其他相关指令设置环境变量的功能，该功能可以让您在服务器端执行多种动态内容，而无需使用完整的Web应用程序。

trans-unit.source: With Pw specified as 512, a pushed, interleaved stream would get double the weight of X. With 128 only half as much. Note that effective weights are always capped at 256.
trans-unit.target: 当Pw指定为512时,一个推送的交错流将获得X的双倍重量,而128时只有一半。请注意,有效权重总是以256为上限。

trans-unit.source: With a network-mounted DocumentRoot (e.g., NFS, SMB, CIFS, FUSE), the kernel may be unable to serve the network file through its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 使用网络安装的 DocumentRoot （例如NFS，SMB，CIFS，FUSE），内核可能无法通过其自己的缓存为网络文件提供服务。

trans-unit.source: With a request for http://www.example.com/~bob/one/two.html, will try to find the page at ~bob/public_html/one/two.html first, then /usr/web/bob/one/two.html, and finally it will send a redirect to http://www.example.com/bob/one/two.html.
trans-unit.target: 在请求 http://www.example.com/~bob/one/two.html 的情况下，它将首先尝试在 ~bob/public_html/one/two.html 上找到该页面，然后在 /usr/web/bob/one/two.html ，最后它将重定向发送到 http://www.example.com/bob/one/two.html 。

trans-unit.source: With an NFS-mounted filesystem, the kernel may be unable to reliably serve the network file through its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 在NFS挂载的文件系统中,内核可能无法通过自己的缓存可靠地服务于网络文件。

trans-unit.source: With more complicated setups, you can use httpd's normal <VirtualHost> directives to control the scope of the various virtual hosting configurations. For example, you could have one IP address for general customers' homepages, and another for commercial customers, with the following setup. This can be combined with conventional <VirtualHost> configuration sections, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 通过更复杂的设置，您可以使用httpd的常规 <VirtualHost> 指令来控制各种虚拟主机配置的范围。例如，通过以下设置，您可以为普通客户的主页提供一个IP地址，为商业客户提供一个IP地址。可以将其与常规的 <VirtualHost> 配置节结合使用，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: With name-based virtual hosting, the server relies on the client to report the hostname as part of the HTTP headers. Using this technique, many different hosts can share the same IP address.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于名称的虚拟主机,服务器依靠客户端报告主机名作为HTTP头的一部分。使用这种技术,许多不同的主机可以共享同一个IP地址。

trans-unit.source: With the prefork MPM, use this directive only if you need to set MaxRequestWorkers higher than 256 (default). Do not set the value of this directive any higher than what you might want to set MaxRequestWorkers to.
trans-unit.target: 对于 prefork MPM，仅当需要将 MaxRequestWorkers 设置为大于256（默认值）时，才使用此伪指令。请勿将此指令的值设置得比您要设置 MaxRequestWorkers 的值高。

trans-unit.source: With the B flag set on this same rule, the parameters are re-encoded before being passed on to the output URL, resulting in a correct mapping to /search.php?term=x%20%26%20y%2Fz.
trans-unit.target: 在此规则上设置B标志后，参数将在传递到输出URL之前重新编码，从而正确映射到 /search.php?term=x%20%26%20y%2Fz 。

trans-unit.source: With the [E], or [env] flag, you can set the value of an environment variable. Note that some environment variables may be set after the rule is run, thus unsetting what you have set. See the Environment Variables document for more details on how Environment variables work.
trans-unit.target: 使用[E]或[env]标志，可以设置环境变量的值。请注意，在运行规则后可能会设置一些环境变量，从而取消设置的内容。有关环境变量如何工作的更多详细信息，请参见环境变量文档。

trans-unit.source: With the [QSA] flag, a request for /pages/123?one=two will be mapped to /page.php?page=123&one=two. Without the [QSA] flag, that same request will be mapped to /page.php?page=123 - that is, the existing query string will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 使用[QSA]标志，对 /pages/123?one=two 的请求将映射到 /page.php?page=123&one=two 。如果没有[QSA]标志，该请求将被映射到 /page.php?page=123 -也就是说，现有查询字符串将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: With the default value, Off, such URLs are refused with a 404 (Not found) error.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值 Off 时，将拒绝此类URL，并显示404（未找到）错误。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of some built-in comparison operators, binary operators have the form "-[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+", i.e. a minus and at least two characters. The name is not case sensitive. Modules may register additional binary operators.
trans-unit.target: 除某些内置比较运算符外，二进制运算符的格式为“ -[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+ ”，即减号和至少两个字符。名称不区分大小写。模块可以注册其他二进制运算符。

trans-unit.source: With the file-based mechanisms fcntl and flock, the path, if provided, is a directory where the lock file will be created. The default directory is httpd's run-time file directory relative to ServerRoot. Always use a local disk filesystem for /path/to/mutex and never a directory residing on a NFS- or AFS-filesystem. The basename of the file will be the mutex type, an optional instance string provided by the module, and unless the OmitPID keyword is specified, the process id of the httpd parent process will be appended to make the file name unique, avoiding conflicts when multiple httpd instances share a lock file directory. For example, if the mutex name is mpm-accept and the lock file directory is /var/httpd/locks, the lock file name for the httpd instance with parent process id 12345 would be /var/httpd/locks/mpm-accept.12345.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于文件的机制fcntl和flock，该路径（如果提供）是将在其中创建锁定文件的目录。默认目录是httpd的相对于 ServerRoot 的运行时文件目录。始终对 /path/to/mutex 使用本地磁盘文件系统，而不要对位于NFS或AFS文件系统上的目录使用。文件的基本名称将是互斥体类型，即模块提供的可选实例字符串，除非指定了 OmitPID 关键字，否则将附加httpd父进程的进程ID以使文件名唯一，从而避免了多个文件名冲突的情况。 httpd实例共享一个锁定文件目录。例如，如果互斥锁名称为 mpm-accept 并且锁文件目录为 /var/httpd/locks ，父进程ID为12345的httpd实例的锁文件名称为 /var/httpd/locks/mpm-accept.12345 。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of SSLCARevocationFile, the behavior has been changed: by default with chain or leaf, CRLs must be present for the validation to succeed - otherwise it will fail with an "unable to get certificate CRL" error.
trans-unit.target: 随着 SSLCARevocationFile 的引入，行为已更改：默认情况下，使用 chain 或 leaf 时，必须存在CRL 才能使验证成功-否则它将失败，并显示 "unable to get certificate CRL" 错误。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of authorization container directives such as <RequireAll> and <RequireAny>, the configuration also has control over when the authorization methods are called and what criteria determines when access is granted. See Authorization Containers for an example of how they may be used to express complex authorization logic.
trans-unit.target: 通过引入授权容器指令（例如 <RequireAll> 和 <RequireAny> )，该配置还可以控制何时调用授权方法以及由什么条件确定何时授予访问权限。有关如何使用它们表示复杂的授权逻辑的示例，请参见授权容器。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of the new provider based authentication and authorization architecture, you are no longer locked into a single authentication or authorization method. In fact any number of the providers can be mixed and matched to provide you with exactly the scheme that meets your needs. In the following example, both the file and LDAP based authentication providers are being used.
trans-unit.target: 随着新的基于提供商的认证和授权架构的引入,您不再被锁定在单一的认证或授权方法上。事实上,任何数量的提供者都可以混合和匹配,为您提供符合您需求的方案。在下面的例子中,同时使用了基于文件和LDAP的认证提供者。

trans-unit.source: With the value NoDecode, such URLs are accepted, but encoded slashes are not decoded but left in their encoded state.
trans-unit.target: 使用值 NoDecode ，可以接受此类URL，但是不会对编码的斜杠进行解码，而是将其保留为编码状态。

trans-unit.source: With the value On, such URLs are accepted, and encoded slashes are decoded like all other encoded characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 On ，则接受此类URL，并且像所有其他编码字符一样对编码斜杠进行解码。

trans-unit.source: With this option, the value of RewriteBase is copied from where it's explicitly defined into any sub-directory or sub-location that doesn't define its own RewriteBase. This was the default behavior in 2.4.0 through 2.4.3, and the flag to restore it is available Apache HTTP Server 2.4.4 and later.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项， RewriteBase 的值从显式定义的位置复制到未定义自己的 RewriteBase 的任何子目录或子位置。这是2.4.0到2.4.3中的默认行为，并且可以使用Apache HTTP Server 2.4.4和更高版本来恢复该标志。

trans-unit.source: With this setup, http://example.com/phparea can be used to access the output of the PHP scripts, and http://example.com/php-source can be used with a DAV client to manipulate them.
trans-unit.target: 通过此设置，可以使用 http://example.com/phparea 访问PHP脚本的输出，并且可以将 http://example.com/php-source 与DAV客户端一起使用来操纵它们。

trans-unit.source: Within the same instance, Apache httpd will check and fail to start if multiple Listen directives on the exact same IP (or hostname) and port are configured, thus avoiding the creation of some duplicated buckets which would be useless and kill performances. However it can't (and won't try harder to) catch all the possible overlapping cases (like a hostname resolving to an IP used elsewhere).
trans-unit.target: 在同一实例中，如果在完全相同的IP（或主机名）和端口上配置了多个 Listen 指令，则Apache httpd将检查并无法启动，从而避免了创建一些重复的存储桶，这些存储桶是无用的并且会降低性能。但是，它不能（也不会更努力地）捕获所有可能重叠的情况（例如将主机名解析为其他地方使用的IP）。

trans-unit.source: Without this flag you would have to write the condition/rule pair three times.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有这个标志,你将不得不写三次条件/规则对。

trans-unit.source: Words, hosts, or domains that are banned from being proxied
trans-unit.target: 被禁止代理的字词、主机或域名。

trans-unit.source: Worker has failed dynamic health check and will not be used until it passes subsequent health checks.
trans-unit.target: 工人未通过动态健康检查,在通过后续的健康检查之前,将不能使用。

trans-unit.source: Worker is a hot spare. For each worker in a given lbset that is unusable (draining, stopped, in error, etc.), a usable hot spare with the same lbset will be used in its place. Hot spares can help ensure that a specific number of workers are always available for use by a balancer.
trans-unit.target: 工人是热备用工。对于给定磅数组中无法使用的每个工人(排空、停止、错误等),将使用相同磅数组的可用热备品代替。热备品有助于确保平衡器始终有特定数量的工人可供使用。

trans-unit.source: Worker is administratively stopped; will not accept requests and will not be automatically retried
trans-unit.target: 工作者处于管理停止状态,不接受请求,也不会自动重试。

trans-unit.source: Worker is disabled and will not accept any requests; will be automatically retried.
trans-unit.target: 工作者被禁用,不接受任何请求;将自动重试。

trans-unit.source: Worker is in an error state, usually due to failing pre-request check; requests will not be proxied to this worker, but it will be retried depending on the retry setting of the worker.
trans-unit.target: 工作者处于错误状态，通常是由于请求前检查失败所致；请求不会被代理给该工作程序，但是将根据该工作程序的 retry 设置对其进行重试。

trans-unit.source: Worker is in drain mode and will only accept existing sticky sessions destined for itself and ignore all other requests.
trans-unit.target: Worker处于drain模式,只会接受现有的以自己为目的地的粘性会话,而忽略所有其他请求。

trans-unit.source: Worker is in hot-standby mode and will only be used if no other viable workers or spares are available in the balancer set.
trans-unit.target: 工件处于热备模式,只有在平衡器组中没有其他可行的工件或备用工件时才会使用。

trans-unit.source: Worker is in ignore-errors mode and will always be considered available.
trans-unit.target: 工作者处于无视错误模式,将始终被视为可用。

trans-unit.source: Worker sharing happens if the worker URLs overlap, which occurs when the URL of some worker is a leading substring of the URL of another worker defined later in the configuration file. In the following example
trans-unit.target: 如果工作者 URL 重叠,则会发生工作者共享,当某些工作者的 URL 是配置文件中稍后定义的另一个工作者的 URL 的前导子串时,就会发生共享。在下面的示例中

trans-unit.source: Write a Comma separated value (CSV) file which contains for each percentage (from 1% to 100%) the time (in milliseconds) it took to serve that percentage of the requests. This is usually more useful than the 'gnuplot' file; as the results are already 'binned'.
trans-unit.target: 编写一个逗号分隔值(CSV)文件,其中包含每个百分比(从1%到100%)服务于该百分比请求所需的时间(以毫秒为单位)。这通常比 "gnuplot "文件更有用;因为结果已经被 "分层 "了。

trans-unit.source: Write all measured values out as a 'gnuplot' or TSV (Tab separate values) file. This file can easily be imported into packages like Gnuplot, IDL, Mathematica, Igor or even Excel. The labels are on the first line of the file.
trans-unit.target: 将所有测量值写入 "gnuplot "或TSV(Tab separate values)文件。这个文件可以很容易地导入到Gnuplot、IDL、Mathematica、Igor甚至Excel等软件包中。标签在文件的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Yes. HTTP and HTTPS use different server ports (HTTP binds to port 80, HTTPS to port 443), so there is no direct conflict between them. You can either run two separate server instances bound to these ports, or use Apache's elegant virtual hosting facility to create two virtual servers, both served by the same instance of Apache - one responding over HTTP to requests on port 80, and the other responding over HTTPS to requests on port 443.
trans-unit.target: 是的,HTTP和HTTPS使用不同的服务器端口(HTTP绑定到80端口,HTTPS绑定到443端口),所以它们之间没有直接冲突。你可以运行两个单独的服务器实例,绑定到这些端口,或者使用Apache优雅的虚拟主机设施来创建两个虚拟服务器,都由同一个Apache实例提供服务--一个通过HTTP响应端口80的请求,另一个通过HTTPS响应端口443的请求。

trans-unit.source: Yes. In general, starting Apache with mod_ssl built-in is just like starting Apache without it. However, if you have a passphrase on your SSL private key file, a startup dialog will pop up which asks you to enter the pass phrase.
trans-unit.target: 是。通常，使用内置的 mod_ssl 启动Apache就像不使用它启动Apache。但是，如果您的SSL私钥文件上有密码短语，则会弹出一个启动对话框，要求您输入密码。

trans-unit.source: You can achieve the same with mod_alias and some Redirect configuration, basically. If you do it yourself, please make sure to exclude the paths /.well-known/* from your redirection, otherwise mod_md might have trouble signing on new certificates.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，您可以使用 mod_alias 和一些 Redirect 配置来实现相同的目的。如果您自己执行此操作，请确保从重定向中排除路径/.well-known/*，否则 mod_md 可能无法在新证书上签名。

trans-unit.source: You can afford the memory and file descriptor requirements of listening to every IP alias on the machine. It's only possible to Listen to the "wildcard" address, or to specific addresses. So if you have a need to listen to a specific address for whatever reason, then you will need to listen to all specific addresses. (Although one httpd could listen to N-1 of the addresses, and another could listen to the remaining address.)
trans-unit.target: 您可以承受侦听计算机上每个IP别名的内存和文件描述符要求。只能 Listen “通配符”地址或特定的地址。因此，如果出于任何原因需要监听特定的地址，则需要监听所有特定的地址。 （尽管一个 httpd 可以监听N-1个地址，另一个httpd可以监听其余的地址。）

trans-unit.source: You can also force a request to be handled as a reverse-proxy request, by creating a suitable Handler pass-through. The example configuration below will pass all requests for PHP scripts to the specified FastCGI server using reverse proxy. This feature is available in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.10 and later. For performance reasons, you will want to define a worker representing the same fcgi:// backend. The benefit of this form is that it allows the normal mapping of URI to filename to occur in the server, and the local filesystem result is passed to the backend. When FastCGI is configured this way, the server can calculate the most accurate PATH_INFO.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过创建合适的Handler传递来强制将请求作为反向代理请求进行处理。下面的示例配置将使用反向代理将对PHP脚本的所有请求传递到指定的FastCGI服务器。Apache HTTP Server 2.4.10和更高版本中提供了此功能。由于性能原因，你将要定义一个工人代表相同FCGI：//后端。这种形式的好处是，它允许在服务器中进行URI到文件名的常规映射，并将本地文件系统结果传递到后端。通过这种方式配置FastCGI后，服务器可以计算出最准确的PATH_INFO。

trans-unit.source: You can also run Apache via the shortcut Start Apache in Console placed to Start Menu --> Programs --> Apache HTTP Server 2.4.xx --> Control Apache Server during the installation. This will open a console window and start Apache inside it. If you don't have Apache installed as a service, the window will remain visible until you stop Apache by pressing Control-C in the console window where Apache is running in. The server will exit in a few seconds. However, if you do have Apache installed as a service, the shortcut starts the service. If the Apache service is running already, the shortcut doesn't do anything.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过在安装过程中放置​​在 Start Menu --> Programs --> Apache HTTP Server 2.4.xx --> Control Apache Server 中的控制台中的启动Apache快捷方式来运行Apache 。这将打开一个控制台窗口，并在其中启动Apache。如果您没有安装Apache作为服务，则该窗口将保持可见，直到您通过在运行Apache的控制台窗口中按Control-C停止Apache为止。服务器将在几秒钟后退出。但是，如果您确实将Apache安装为服务，则快捷方式将启动该服务。如果Apache服务已经在运行，则快捷方式不会执行任何操作。

You can run HTTPS on any port, but the standards specify port 443, which is where any HTTPS compliant browser will look by default. You can force your browser to look on a different port by specifying it in the URL. For example, if your server is set up to serve pages over HTTPS on port 8080, you can access them at https://example.com:8080/
trans-unit.target: 您可以在任何端口上运行HTTPS，但是标准指定端口443，默认情况下，该端口是所有HTTPS兼容浏览器的外观。您可以通过在URL中指定浏览器来强制浏览器使用其他端口。例如，如果您的服务器设置为通过端口8080上的HTTPS提供页面，则可以通过 https://example.com:8080/ 访问它们。

trans-unit.source: You can select different PrivilegesModes for each virtual host, and even in a directory context within a virtual host. FAST mode is appropriate where the user(s) are trusted and/or have no privilege to load in-process code. SECURE mode is appropriate to cases where untrusted code might be run in-process. However, even in SECURE mode, there is no protection against a malicious user who is able to introduce privileges-aware code running before the start of the request-processing cycle.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为每个虚拟主机甚至在虚拟主机中的目录上下文中选择不同的 PrivilegesMode 。 FAST 模式适用于受信任的用户和/或没有特权加载进程内代码的情况。 SECURE 模式适用于可能在进程中运行不受信任的代码的情况。但是，即使在 SECURE 模式下，也无法防止恶意用户在请求处理周期开始之前引入运行特权的代码。

For example, a jpeg file is usually of higher source quality than an ascii file if it is attempting to represent a photograph. However, if the resource being represented is ascii art, then an ascii file would have a higher source quality than a jpeg file. All qs values are therefore specific to a given resource.

trans-unit.source: also known as asymmetric cryptography, solves the key exchange problem by defining an algorithm which uses two keys, each of which may be used to encrypt a message. If one key is used to encrypt a message then the other must be used to decrypt it. This makes it possible to receive secure messages by simply publishing one key (the public key) and keeping the other secret (the private key).
trans-unit.target: 也称为非对称密码学,通过定义一个使用两个密钥的算法来解决密钥交换问题,每个密钥都可以用来加密一个信息。如果一个密钥用于加密信息,那么另一个密钥必须用于解密。这样,只需公布一把钥匙(公钥),并将另一把钥匙保密(私钥),就可以接收安全的信息。

trans-unit.source: also known as symmetric cryptography, requires the sender and receiver to share a key: a secret piece of information that may be used to encrypt or decrypt a message. As long as this key is kept secret, nobody other than the sender or recipient can read the message. If Alice and the bank know a secret key, then they can send each other private messages. The task of sharing a key between sender and recipient before communicating, while also keeping it secret from others, can be problematic.
trans-unit.target: 也称为对称加密,要求发送者和接收者共享一个密钥:一个可用于加密或解密信息的秘密信息。只要这个密钥是保密的,除了发送者或接收者之外,没有人可以读取信息。如果Alice和银行知道一个秘密密钥,那么他们就可以互相发送私人信息。在通信之前,发送者和接收者之间共享密钥,同时还要对其他人保密,这个任务可能会很麻烦。

trans-unit.target: httpd-Apache超文本传输协议服务器

trans-unit.source: httpd allows for decentralized management of configuration via special files placed inside the web tree. The special files are usually called .htaccess, but any name can be specified in the AccessFileName directive. Directives placed in .htaccess files apply to the directory where you place the file, and all sub-directories. The .htaccess files follow the same syntax as the main configuration files. Since .htaccess files are read on every request, changes made in these files take immediate effect.
trans-unit.target: httpd允许通过放置在Web树中的特殊文件来分散管理配置。特殊文件通常称为 .htaccess ，但可以在 AccessFileName 指令中指定任何名称。放置在 .htaccess 文件中的指令适用于放置文件的目录以及所有子目录。该 .htaccess 文件遵循相同的语法主要配置文件。由于每次请求都会读取 .htaccess 文件，因此对这些文件所做的更改将立即生效。

trans-unit.source: httpd also allows you to bring remote documents into the URL space of the local server. This technique is called reverse proxying because the web server acts like a proxy server by fetching the documents from a remote server and returning them to the client. It is different from normal (forward) proxying because, to the client, it appears the documents originate at the reverse proxy server.
trans-unit.target: httpd还允许您将远程文档带入本地服务器的URL空间。该技术称为反向代理，因为Web服务器通过从远程服务器获取文档并将它们返回给客户端来像代理服务器一样工作。它与常规（正向）代理不同，因为对于客户端，文档似乎来自反向代理服务器。

trans-unit.target: httpd可以在Windows上使用基于cmake的构建系统,也可以使用httpd开发者维护的Visual Studio项目文件进行构建。基于cmake的构建系统直接支持更多版本的Visual Studio,但目前在功能上有很大的限制。

trans-unit.source: httpd configuration files contain one directive per line. The backslash "\" may be used as the last character on a line to indicate that the directive continues onto the next line. There must be no other characters or white space between the backslash and the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: httpd 配置文件每行包含一条指令。反斜杠"\"可以作为一行的最后一个字符,表示该指令将继续执行到下一行。在反斜杠和行尾之间不能有其他字符或空白。

trans-unit.source: httpd extends the transparent content negotiation protocol (RFC 2295) as follows. A new {encoding ..} element is used in variant lists to label variants which are available with a specific content-encoding only. The implementation of the RVSA/1.0 algorithm (RFC 2296) is extended to recognize encoded variants in the list, and to use them as candidate variants whenever their encodings are acceptable according to the Accept-Encoding request header. The RVSA/1.0 implementation does not round computed quality factors to 5 decimal places before choosing the best variant.
trans-unit.target: httpd扩展了透明内容协商协议（RFC 2295），如下所示。变体列表中使用了一个新的 {encoding ..} 元素来标记仅适用于特定内容编码的变体。扩展了RVSA / 1.0算法（RFC 2296）的实现，以识别列表中的编码变体，并在根据 Accept-Encoding 请求标头接受编码时，将其用作候选变体。在选择最佳变体之前，RVSA / 1.0实现不会将计算出的质量因数四舍五入到小数点后五位。

trans-unit.source: httpd has the capability to serve many different websites simultaneously. This is called Virtual Hosting. Directives can also be scoped by placing them inside <VirtualHost> sections, so that they will only apply to requests for a particular website.
trans-unit.target: httpd可以同时服务于许多不同的网站。这称为虚拟主机。也可以通过将指令放在 <VirtualHost> 部分中来确定其范围，以便它们仅适用于对特定网站的请求。

trans-unit.source: httpd is a modular server. This implies that only the most basic functionality is included in the core server. Extended features are available through modules which can be loaded into httpd. By default, a base set of modules is included in the server at compile-time. If the server is compiled to use dynamically loaded modules, then modules can be compiled separately and added at any time using the LoadModule directive. Otherwise, httpd must be recompiled to add or remove modules. Configuration directives may be included conditional on a presence of a particular module by enclosing them in an <IfModule> block. However, <IfModule> blocks are not required, and in some cases may mask the fact that you're missing an important module.
trans-unit.target: httpd是模块化服务器。这意味着核心服务器中仅包含最基本的功能。可通过可加载到httpd中的模块获得扩展功能。默认情况下，服务器在编译时会包含一组基本模块。如果将服务器编译为使用动态加载的模块，则可以分别编译模块，并可以随时使用 LoadModule 指令添加模块。否则，必须重新编译httpd以添加或删除模块。通过将特定指令包含在 <IfModule> 块中，可以根据特定模块的存在将其包含在配置指令中。但是， <IfModule> 块不是必需的，并且在某些情况下可能掩盖了您缺少重要模块的事实。

trans-unit.source: httpd is also capable of Virtual Hosting, where the server receives requests for more than one host. In this case, a different DocumentRoot can be specified for each virtual host, or alternatively, the directives provided by the module mod_vhost_alias can be used to dynamically determine the appropriate place from which to serve content based on the requested IP address or hostname.
trans-unit.target: httpd还具有“ 虚拟主机”功能，该服务器可以在其中接收多个主机的请求。在这种情况下，可以为每个虚拟主机指定不同的 DocumentRoot ，或者可以使用模块 mod_vhost_alias 提供的指令根据请求的IP地址或主机名动态确定从何处提供内容。

trans-unit.source: httpd sometimes changes the quality values from what would be expected by a strict interpretation of the httpd negotiation algorithm above. This is to get a better result from the algorithm for browsers which do not send full or accurate information. Some of the most popular browsers send Accept header information which would otherwise result in the selection of the wrong variant in many cases. If a browser sends full and correct information these fiddles will not be applied.
trans-unit.target: httpd有时会通过严格解释上述httpd协商算法所期望的值来更改质量值。对于未发送完整或准确信息的浏览器，这是从算法中获得更好的结果。一些最受欢迎的浏览器会发送 Accept 标头信息，否则在许多情况下会导致选择错误的变体。如果浏览器发送了完整且正确的信息，这些提琴将不会被应用。

trans-unit.source: httpd supports 'server driven' content negotiation, as defined in the HTTP/1.1 specification. It fully supports the Accept, Accept-Language, Accept-Charset and Accept-Encoding request headers. httpd also supports 'transparent' content negotiation, which is an experimental negotiation protocol defined in RFC 2295 and RFC 2296. It does not offer support for 'feature negotiation' as defined in these RFCs.
trans-unit.target: httpd支持HTTP / 1.1规范中定义的“服务器驱动”内容协商。它完全支持 Accept ， Accept-Language ， Accept-Charset 和 Accept-Encoding 请求标头。httpd还支持“透明”内容协商，这是RFC 2295和RFC 2296中定义的实验性协商协议。它不提供对这些RFC中定义的“功能协商”的支持。

trans-unit.source: is a fully qualified DNS domain name which can be resolved to one or more IPAddrs via the DNS domain name service. It represents a logical host (in contrast to Domains, see above) and must be resolvable to at least one IPAddr (or often to a list of hosts with different IPAddrs).

trans-unit.source: is a partially qualified internet address in numeric (dotted quad) form, optionally followed by a slash and the netmask, specified as the number of significant bits in the <var>SubNet</var>. In the absence of the explicit net mask it is assumed that omitted (or zero valued) trailing digits specify the mask. (In this case, the netmask can only be multiples of 8 bits wide.) Examples:

trans-unit.source: is an intermediate server that sits between the client and the origin server. In order to get content from the origin server, the client sends a request to the proxy naming the origin server as the target. The proxy then requests the content from the origin server and returns it to the client. The client must be specially configured to use the forward proxy to access other sites.
trans-unit.target: 是位于客户端和原始服务器之间的中间服务器。为了从原始服务器获取内容，客户端向代理发送请求，将原始服务器命名为目标。然后，代理从源服务器请求内容，并将其返回给客户端。必须将客户端特别配置为使用正向代理访问其他站点。
